mapper.select: /* 사용자 조회 by ID */ SELECT idx, id, password, accessToken, regDate FROM memopad_user WHERE id = #{id}
/* 사용자 조회 by Key */ SELECT idx, id, accessToken, regDate FROM memopad_user WHERE accessToken = #{accessToken}
mapper.insert: /* 회원가입 */ INSERT INTO memopad_user ( id, password, regDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, NOW() )
